QueryDefinition.Query: select *, 32880 PeriodTypeConceptId from ( SELECT DISTINCT ch.person_id as patid, a.patid as person_source_value, a.frd, case when yob > 1800 then yob else yob + 1800 end YEAR_OF_BIRTH, case when mob > 0 then mob else null end as MONTH_OF_BIRTH, null DAY_OF_BIRTH, coalesce(gender, 0) gender, a.pracid CARE_SITE_ID, case when a.crd > b.uts then a.crd else b.uts end as observation_period_start_date, case when a.tod is null then b.lcd when a.tod is not null and a.tod < b.lcd then a.tod when a.tod is not null and a.tod >= b.lcd then b.lcd else '23-DEC-2099' end as observation_period_end_date, deathdate, toreason, CASE WHEN toreason = 1 and deathdate is not null and deathdate > to_date('1987-01-01', 'yyyy-MM-dd') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as DIED, null as RACE_CONCEPT_ID, null as RACE_SOURCE_VALUE, accept, ch.PartitionId from {sc}.PATIENT a JOIN {ch_sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND a.patid = ch.person_id join {sc}.practice b on a.pracid = b.pracid ) as person order by PartitionId, patid
